__e: Despite my power, I've been unable to locate him, which suggests he's gone to great lengths to hide himself, and Elijah hides from no one...
You should have run the second your realized Elijah was gone.
Finding Elijah didn't make my to-do list today.
My brother Elijah told me about you.
It wasn't until Elijah was... taken away that I realized how woven he was into the fabric of my entire life.
Look, Elijah promised me that his family wouldn't hurt any of us.

I went through my whole rage spiral. I took it out on Klaus, Elijah, and they deserved what they got. But, um... now that it's all said and done, and... and you're still gone, the, uh... the only thing that keeps me in check is a code that I had... when I was a kid.
You might not want to believe this, But Elijah is a man of his word.
I want to figure out a way for us all to work together now that Elijah's out of the picture.
You know, if you're so determined to be this way, then everything that Elijah has done for you, including his death, will be for nothing.
Yes, but Elijah promised to keep me and everyone else safe as long as we played by his rules.
I know in the last millennium, we haven't always seen eye to eye, but in this moment, I am reminded once again of something Elijah has always said.
